tool_description: Comprehensive style guide compliance checker that validates academic documents against major style guide requirements including formatting, language, and presentation standards.

document_text.description: Full text content of the document

style_guide.description: Style guide to check against: APA, MLA, Chicago, Harvard, IEEE, Vancouver, or AMA

check_language.description: Whether to check language and tone requirements

check_numbers.description: Whether to check number formatting rules

check_headings.description: Whether to validate heading format and hierarchy

strictness_level.description: Validation strictness: lenient, standard, or strict

custom_rules.description: Additional custom style rules to check

ignore_patterns.description: Text patterns to ignore during validation

error_messages: Empty document: Document text cannot be empty.
Unsupported style guide: Use one of [APA, MLA, Chicago, Harvard, IEEE, Vancouver, AMA].
Invalid strictness level: Use lenient, standard, or strict.
Document too long: Maximum document length exceeded for processing.
Invalid custom rules format: Custom rules must be properly formatted strings.
usage: Provide document_text and style_guide, then configure validation options. The tool will comprehensively check compliance with the specified style guide requirements.

violations.description: List of style guide violations found

warnings.description: Minor issues that may need attention

category_scores.description: Compliance scores by category (formatting, citations, language, etc.)
